translate

Class TCPNetToSMVTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • translate.TCPNetToSMVTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreferenceInputTranslator

    public class TCPNetToSMVTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements PreferenceInputTranslator
    Translates TCP-nets specified in XML format into SMV model suitable as input for model checkers Cadence SMV and NuSMV. Based on the chosen model checker (according to value set in the constant Constants.CURRENT_MODEL_CHECKER), the output file format differs. Translation is based on the theory from the paper "Dominance Testing via Model Checking" Santhanam et al. AAAI 2010 which contains the precise translation rules.
    Author:
    gsanthan
    See Also:
    translate.PreferenceInputTranslator#convertToSMV(java.lang.String, int, boolean)

    • Method Detail

      • convertToSMV

        public java.lang.String convertToSMV(java.lang.String xmlFile,
                            int sampleSize)
                              throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                     org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                     java.io.IOException,
                                     javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        Parses XML file and saves a SMV file fit for model checking by NuSMV or Cadence SMV. Also generates random 'sampleSize' specs, i.e., dominance test cases and saves them in a separate '.spec' file. Note: Output file syntax is switched according to value set in the constant Constants.CURRENT_MODEL_CHECKER
        Specified by:
        convertToSMV in interface PreferenceInputTranslator
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - Name of file specifying the input TCP-net
        sampleSize - Number of sample dominance test cases to be generated
        Returns:
        Name of saved SMV file that can be model checked by NuSMV or Cadence SMV
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException
        See Also:
        CINetToSMVTranslator, TCPNetToSMVTranslator
